name: QuestionTagStats
description: Statistics for question tags per user session

total_questions.description: Total questions for this tag in the session

correct_answers.description: Number of correct answers for this tag

wrong_answers.description: Number of wrong answers for this tag

unanswered.description: Number of unanswered questions for this tag

total_time_seconds.description: Total time spent on questions of this tag

average_time_seconds.description: Average time per question for this tag
